details.heading: Problem Set Distribution
details.description: Site coordinators will provide one copy of the problem set per team member, in addition to the PDF and sample data on the contest server.

details.heading: Paper Reference Material
details.description: Teams may use any amount of paper reference material. This includes books and printed notes.

details.heading: Pen and Paper
details.description: Teams may use pens and paper for developing and discussing solutions among themselves.

details.heading: Printing Code
details.description: Teams may print code from their computer. Site coordinators should make a best effort to ensure this is supported.

details.heading: Single Computer
details.description: Teams must use only one computer, one keyboard, and one monitor.

details.heading: Provided Devices
details.description: Teams competing at a live site must use only the devices provided and cannot bring their own.

details.heading: Remote Teams
details.description: The only exception is for unofficial teams competing remotely, who should use their own devices and arrange an informal system to claim and unclaim use of the keyboard.
